name: Borderlands 2: Captain Scarlett and Her Pirate's Booty
name_original: Borderlands 2: Captain Scarlett and Her Pirate's Booty
description:
Borderlands 2: Captain Scarlett and Her Pirate's Booty is an action, shooter and RPG game developed by Gearbox Software. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by 2K Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Borderlands 2: Captain Scarlett and Her Pirate's Booty is available on PC, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
